description: Repair of potholes on municipal roads.
text: Potholes on all major and minor municipal roads shall be repaired within 72 working hours (3 days) of reporting.

description: Repair or replacement of non-functional streetlights.
text: Complaints regarding non-functional streetlights must be resolved within 48 working hours. Pole replacement may take up to 7 working days.

description: Clearance of uncollected garbage or illegal dumping.
text: Uncollected garbage or reports of illegal dumping sites must be cleared within 24 hours of the complaint being lodged.

description: Repair of visible water pipe leakage.
text: Visible water pipe leakages involving wastage of drinking water must be attended to and fixed within 24 hours.

description: Removal of dead animals from public spaces.
text: Carcasses of small or large animals on public roads or spaces must be removed within 12 hours of reporting.

description: Removal of fallen trees blocking roads.
text: Fallen trees blocking traffic or causing immediate danger must be removed or moved to the side within 6 hours. Complete clearance within 24 hours.
